Interfaces to WalkGenJRL

This group shows how to interface the WalkGenJRL library to three kinds of applications: More...

This group shows how to interface the WalkGenJRL library to three kinds of applications:

  • An OpenHRP plugin, to run in real-time inside an HRP-2 humanoid robot,
  • A console program, for quick but yet complete testing of the pattern generator,
  • An OpenGL interface.



JRL Walking Pattern Generator Documentation
